comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body:
Committed revision 1103069.

Thanks again David! By the way, I added you as a contributor to JIRA, and also added a "flexscoring branch" as a version in JIRA.

So you should be able to create issues for anything you find, marking them with this version, and assign them to yourself while you are working on them.

comments.author: David Mark Nemeskey
comments.body: Thanks Robert! I have added the flexscoring branch to the Affected Version/s field as well to indicate that this whole issue belongs there.
